segments.text: What do I do with it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want me to help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look . Here are the core classes . Everyone has to take them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So I don't have to worry about them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're catching on ! However , there are elective courses like wood shop , metal shop , home economics ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Now you can pick classes by yourself .
segments.speaker: S1
